trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer" /> 類型公開至 UI 自動化。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentScrollViewerAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentScrollViewerAutomationPeer" /> 關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentScrollViewerAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentScrollViewerAutomationPeer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentScrollViewerAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentScrollViewerAutomationPeer" /> 的控制項型別。
這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" /> 所呼叫。
<see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Document" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentScrollViewerAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentScrollViewerAutomationPeer" /> 的子項目集合。
這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" /> 所呼叫。
子元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentScrollViewerAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentScrollViewerAutomationPeer" /> 的名稱。
這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" /> 所呼叫。
包含 "FlowDocumentScrollViewer" 的字串。
其中一個列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentScrollViewerAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentScrollViewerAutomationPeer" /> 的控制項模式。

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is a supported value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="patternInterface" /> 是支援的值則為支援控制項模式的物件，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes what the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentScrollViewerAutomationPeer.GetPattern%2A> method returns when depending on the value of `patternInterface`:
trans-unit.target: 下表說明該怎麼辦<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentScrollViewerAutomationPeer.GetPattern%2A>方法會傳回根據的值時`patternInterface`:
值 `patternInterface`
傳回值
這個 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer> 的 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentScrollViewerAutomationPeer>。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider> 介面的物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> 介面的物件。
